pages.text: The staff is one of the essential components of $(cat:spells)spells$() and $(l:spells/introduction)spell casting$().$(br2)Instead of imbuing spells directly into a staff, they are first permanently imbued into your $(l:spells/library)spell library$() using a $(l:crafting/gramary)gramary$().

$(info) In order to add spells to your staff, simply hold it and press '$(k:roots.keybinds.spell_library)' to open the $(l:spells/library)spell library$().$(br2)This interface allows you to swap spells in and out, adjust the order of spells, and enable/disable modifiers, and is explained in full detail in the spell library entry.
